allurls.description: Grants the extension access to all hosts. It may be possible to avoid declaring any host permissions by using the activeTab permission.
allurls.warning: Read and change all your data on the websites you visit

<all_urls>.description: matches any URL that starts with a permitted scheme (http:, https:, file:, ftp:, or chrome-extension:)
<all_urls>.warning: Read and change all your data on the websites you visit that starts with a permitted scheme (http:, https:, file:, ftp:, or chrome-extension:)

http://*/*.description: Matches any URL that uses the http: scheme.
http://*/*.warning: Read and change all your data on the websites you visit that uses the scheme http://

https://*/*.description: Matches any URL that uses the https: scheme.
https://*/*.warning: Read and change all your data on the websites you visit that uses the scheme https://

*://*/*.description: Matches any URL that uses the https: or http: scheme.
*://*/*.warning: Read and change all your data on the websites you visit that uses the scheme https:// or http://

customurls.description: Grants the extension access to <site>. It may be possible to avoid declaring any host permissions by using the activeTab permission.
customurls.warning: Read and change your data on HostName.com

bookmarks.description: Grants your extension access to the chrome.bookmarks API.

clipboardRead.description: Required if the extension uses document.execCommand('paste').
clipboardRead.warning: Read data you copy and paste

clipboardWrite.description: Indicates the extension uses document.execCommand('copy') or document.execCommand('cut').
clipboardWrite.warning: Modify data you copy and paste

contentSettings.description: Grants your extension access to the chrome.contentSettings API.
contentSettings.warning: Change your settings that control websites' access to features   such as cookies, JavaScript, plugins, geolocation, microphone, camera etc.

debugger.description: Grants your extension access to the chrome.debugger API.
debugger.warning: Access the page debugger backend Read and change all your data on the websites you visit

declarativeNetRequest.description: Grants your extension access to the chrome.declarativeNetRequest API.

desktopCapture.description: Grants your extension access to the chrome.desktopCapture API.

downloads.description: Grants your extension access to the chrome.downloads API.

geolocation.description: Allows the extension to use the HTML5 geolocation API without prompting the user for permission.

history.description: Grants your extension access to the chrome.history API.
history.warning: Read and change your browsing history

management.description: Grants the extension access to the chrome.management API.
management.warning: Manage your apps, extensions, and themes

nativeMessaging.description: Gives the extension access to the native messaging API.

notifications.description: Grants your extension access to the chrome.notifications API.

pageCapture.description: Grants the extension access to the chrome.pageCapture API.
pageCapture.warning: Read and change all your data on the websites you visit

privacy.description: Gives the extension access to the chrome.privacy API.

proxy.description: Grants the extension access to the chrome.proxy API.
proxy.warning: Read and change all your data on the websites you visit

system.storage.description: Grants the extension access to the chrome.system.storage API.

tabCapture.description: Grants the extensions access to the chrome.tabCapture API.
tabCapture.warning: Read and change all your data on the websites you visit

tabs.description: Grants the extension access to privileged fields of the Tab objects used by several APIs including chrome.tabs and chrome.windows. In many circumstances the extension will not need to declare the tabs permission to make use of these APIs.

topSites.description: Grants the extension access to the chrome.topSites API.
topSites.warning: Read a list of your most frequently visited websites

ttsEngine.description: Grants the extension access to the chrome.ttsEngine API.
ttsEngine.warning: Read all text spoken using synthesized speech

webNavigation.description: Grants the extension access to the chrome.webNavigation API.

activeTab.description: Requests that the extension be granted permissions according to the activeTab specification.

alarms.description: Gives your extension access to the chrome.alarms API.

background.description: Makes Chrome start up early and and shut down late, so that apps and extensions can have a longer life. When any installed hosted app, packaged app, or extension has background permission, Chrome runs (invisibly) as soon as the user logs into their computerâ€”before the user launches Chrome. The background permission also makes Chrome continue running (even after its last window is closed) until the user explicitly quits Chrome. Note: Disabled apps and extensions are treated as if they aren't installed. You typically use the background permission with a background page, event page or (for hosted apps) a background window.

browsingData.description: Gives your extension access to the chrome.browsingData API.

certificateProvider.description: Gives your extension access to the chrome.certificateProvider API.

contextMenus.description: Gives your extension access to the chrome.contextMenus API.

cookies.description: Gives your extension access to the chrome.cookies API.

declarativeContent.description: Gives your extension access to the chrome.declarativeContent API.

declarativeWebRequest.description: Gives your extension access to the chrome.declarativeWebRequest API.

displaySource.description: Gives your extension access to the chrome.displaySource API.

dns.description: Gives your extension access to the chrome.dns API.

documentScan.description: Gives your extension access to the chrome.documentScan API.

enterprise.deviceAttributes.description: Gives your extension access to the chrome.enterprise.deviceAttributes API.

enterprise.hardwarePlatform.description: Gives your extension access to the chrome.enterprise.hardwarePlatform API.

enterprise.platformKeys.description: Gives your extension access to the chrome.enterprise.platformKeys API.

experimental.description: Required if the extension or app uses any chrome.experimental.* APIs.

fileBrowserHandler.description: Gives your extension access to the chrome.fileBrowserHandler API.

fileSystemProvider.description: Gives your extension access to the chrome.fileSystemProvider API.

fontSettings.description: Gives your extension access to the chrome.fontSettings API.

gcm.description: Gives your extension access to the chrome.gcm API.

identity.description: Gives your extension access to the chrome.identity API.

idle.description: Gives your extension access to the chrome.idle API.

idltest.description: Gives your extension access to the chrome.idltest API.

networking.config.description: Gives your extension access to the chrome.networking.config API.

platformKeys.description: Gives your extension access to the chrome.platformKeys API.

power.description: Gives your extension access to the chrome.power API.

printerProvider.description: Gives your extension access to the chrome.printerProvider API.

processes.description: Gives your extension access to the chrome.processes API.

sessions.description: Gives your extension access to the chrome.sessions API.

signedInDevices.description: Gives your extension access to the chrome.signedInDevices API.

storage.description: Gives your extension access to the chrome.storage API.

system.cpu.description: Gives your extension access to the chrome.system.cpu API.

system.display.description: Gives your extension access to the chrome.system.display API.

system.memory.description: Gives your extension access to the chrome.system.memory API.

tts.description: Gives your extension access to the chrome.tts API.

unlimitedStorage.description: Provides an unlimited quota for storing HTML5 client-side data, such as databases and local storage files. Without this permission, the extension or app is limited to 5 MB of local storage.                     Note: This permission applies only to Web SQL Database and application cache (see issue 58985). Also, it doesn't currently work with wildcard subdomains such as http://*.example.com.

vpnProvider.description: Gives your extension access to the chrome.vpnProvider API.

wallpaper.description: Gives your extension access to the chrome.wallpaper API.

webRequest.description: Gives your extension access to the chrome.webRequest API.

webRequestBlocking.description: Required if the extension uses the chrome.webRequest API in a blocking fashion.
